snippet.title: Judge Dee -- The City God Case
snippet.description:
A strange mystery is hovering over the small town of Wu Ling.

Even as the population is struck by the curse of the God of the City, the mayor's son, Chen, is found dead on his birthday. Everyone turns to the famous Judge Dee in the hopes he can solve the mystery and put an end to the fate
that has befallen them.

Play the role of Judge Dee in an exotic and mysterious adventure set in ancient China, and take part in a rich and detailed story written by the scriptwriter of the Nancy Drew™ series.


Main features

A world with exceptional graphics
40 locations to explore
30 hidden object scenes
25 puzzles to solve
